title: Firms Swarm Debt Market With $37 Billion in High-Grade Bonds
description: Firms sold $37 billion of investment-grade bonds in the US on the first Monday of 2026, kicking off what’s expected to be a record year for issuance.
content: Firms sold $37 billion of investment-grade bonds in the US on the first Monday of 2026, kicking off what’s expected to be a record year for issuance.
